location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.4863 of 1854 from Henry Anderson, Secretary to the Government of Bombay, to Captain Arnold Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter is an acknowledgement of receipt of Kemball’s letter (folio 379) relating to the successful extraction of fines from the shaikhs of Charrack [Bandar-e Chārak], Kelat and Lingah [Bandar-e Lengeh]. Anderson writes that the Governor in Council approves of the tone and proceedings of Kemball’s report.
